p: Figure 1 shows the effect of EOs in concentrations in the range from 0.05% to 1.5% on changes in optical density (OD) of L. monocytogenes after 24 h. The essential oilsâ€™ MIC values for L. monocytogenes varied from 0.1% to 0.9%. The smallest MIC value was found for SOO (0.1%), followed by CO (0.4%) and the highest for SMO (MIC 0.9%).
